Package net.nergi.util

Class ExceptionSuppressor

Object
ExceptionSuppressor
public final class ExceptionSuppressor
extends Object
A block runner that suppresses and collects thrown exceptions. If it fails to successfully catch an exception, it will rethrow the exception, nested within a FallThroughException.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ExceptionSuppressor()
    Make a new universal suppressor.
    ExceptionSuppressor​(Class<? extends Throwable>... toCatch)
    Make a suppressor that catches the given exception classes and their subclasses.
    ExceptionSuppressor​(Collection<Class<? extends Throwable>> toCatch)
    Make a suppressor that catches the given exception classes and their subclasses.

  • Constructor Details

    • ExceptionSuppressor

      public ExceptionSuppressor()
      Make a new universal suppressor.

      Warning: this will catch anything and everything, including subclasses of Error. So it might be better to use a filtered instance where one is paranoid that errors can occur.

    • ExceptionSuppressor

      @SafeVarargs public ExceptionSuppressor​(Class<? extends Throwable>... toCatch)
      Make a suppressor that catches the given exception classes and their subclasses.
      Parameters:
      toCatch - Exception superclasses

    • ExceptionSuppressor

      public ExceptionSuppressor​(Collection<Class<? extends Throwable>> toCatch)
      Make a suppressor that catches the given exception classes and their subclasses.
      Parameters:
      toCatch - Exception superclasses

  • Method Details

    • suppressedExecute

      public void suppressedExecute​(ThrowingRunnable action)
      Run an action with this expression suppressor.
      Parameters:
      action - Action to run

    • suppressedSubmit

      public <T> T suppressedSubmit​(Callable<T> action, T defaultValue)
      Run a callable and attempt to get its result with this exception suppressor. If an exception was suppressed, a default value is returned instead.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of result
      Parameters:
      action - Callable to execute
      defaultValue - Default value to return
      Returns:
      Result or default value.

    • getSuppressed

      public Set<Throwable> getSuppressed()
      Get a collection of all of the suppressed exceptions.
      Returns:
      All suppressed exceptions.

    • getSuppressedCount

      public int getSuppressedCount()
      Get the number of suppressed exceptions.
      Returns:
      The number of suppressed exceptions.

    • isCleanExecution

      public boolean isCleanExecution()
      Checks if any exceptions were suppressed.
      Returns:
      true if no exceptions were suppressed, false otherwise.

    • rethrowAny

      public <T extends Throwable> void rethrowAny​(Class<T> throwableClass) throws T extends Throwable
      Finds the first instance of a certain Throwable class (or one of its sublcasses and throws it. If it is not found, this method will not throw.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Raw Throwable subclass
      Parameters:
      throwableClass - Throwable subclass to throw
      Throws:
      T - If subclass found in suppressed exceptions.
